title: Drawing, "Design for a Letter Opener", 1942
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink at upper right: 171
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: JEAN PUIFORCAT/42./COUPE-PAPIER/CLOUTÉ VERMEIL/; in graphite: piquère de sellier/; in black ink:  LONGUEUR: 25 cms
provenance: Formerly part of Puiforcat Orfevre archive; Jim Finguerra; John Finguerra
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Letter opener with rectangular handle drawn in elevation and profile.  Handle decorated down the center with four studs indicated in yellow color pencil to be executed in vermeil.  The tapering blade fitted between the studded sides.  Underdrawing in graphite of knife in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Letter Opener", 1942.
1942. Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-1.
